unnormalised: My cousin Priyaâ€™s kid was diagnosed with Trisomy 21; Dr. Verma suggested genetic counseling ASAP after the amniocentesis results came back showing an extra chromosome 21. Apparently, the chances increase if the mother is over 35 yrs old.
normalised: My cousin Priya's kid was diagnosed with Trisomy twenty one; Doctor Verma suggested genetic counseling A-S-A-P after the amniocentesis results came back showing an extra chromosome twenty one. Apparently, the chances increase if the mother is over thirty five years old.
